abstracts.cdata!:
A major purpose of the Project is to
            provide corn storage and container facilities on the bank of
            the estuary, including road and rail access to these
            facilities, dredging equipment for maintenance dredging of
            the channel and related consulting services. Equipment
            presently used in the port has an average ship loading rate
            of some 70 - 80 tons/hr while the Project facilities are
            expected to attain a rate of 1,200 tons/hr.
